title: Mining in Action
creator_credit: Harold Dews, Cinesound Movietone and Conzinc Riotinto of Australia
brief_description: Surveys the development of mining operations of Hammersley Iron and Bougainville copper, the lead/zinc operation of the company and the opening of the aluminium smelter at Bluff, New Zealand.
